908390.name: Infinitrap : Rehamstered
908390.description:
Infinitrap Rehamstered: Brutal Traps, Endless Deaths, and Treasure Beyond Your Wildest Dreams!

Welcome to the Nightmare!

Step into the shoes of Ohio Jack, a fearless treasure hunter who’s not afraid to die—a lot. Infinitrap Rehamstered is a fast-paced, hardcore platformer designed to test your reflexes, patience, and sanity. Perfect for fans of challenging games like Super Meat Boy and I Wanna Be The Guy, this game is not for the faint-hearted. Do you have what it takes to survive?

Key Features:

  • Corpse Bridges: Death isn’t a setback; it’s a strategy! Dead bodies persist and can be used as platforms, helping you reach new areas or avoid traps on subsequent runs. Sometimes, death is the answer, my friend!

  • Dungeon Editor: Build your own dungeons, lure unsuspecting adventurers! / Break out of other peoples' dungeons!

  • 30 Story Levels: Navigate through a labyrinth of relentless traps, spike pits, and hidden surprises. Every step could be your last—so be quick, or be dead!

  • Precision Platforming: Tight, responsive controls ensure every jump, dodge, and dash is under your command. You’ll need every ounce of skill to conquer these levels.

  • Replayability: Compete for the fastest times and highest scores on each level. Perfect your runs to climb the leaderboards and earn bragging rights.

  • Dark Humor: Embrace the madness with a game that doesn’t take itself too seriously. Expect to die often—and laugh just as much!

  • Retro Aesthetic, Modern Twist: Enjoy pixel art that pays homage to classic platformers, with smooth animations and polished visuals in this “Rehamstered” edition.

Are You Ready to Face the Infinitrap?

If you crave the thrill of overcoming impossible odds and laugh in the face of danger, Infinitrap Rehamstered is your next obsession. Whether you’re a speedrunner aiming for perfection or just a glutton for punishment, your ultimate challenge awaits.

Join Ohio Jack on his deadly quest for treasure—if you dare!
